entry.title: Hello World, Again
entry.content:
More than 2 years have passed between my last post and this one. Why? Probably because I didn't have anything interesting to say. Nevertheless you could have found me at Twitter for some random quotes and links.

But lately I've been digging into node.js and started to miss my blog posts, mainly to share some cool stuff I find.

I don't promise a lot of posts, but from time to time you'll be hearing from me. Meanwhile keep following me: @rguerreiro.

BTW, in case you're intrigued with the blog's title, here's the reason: I do believe that every software should be custom to it's users\customers needs (hence the blog's subtitle), just like a tailor cuts the suit to fit your body.

Until next time ;)
